name: Seared Scallops with Lemon Risotto and Asparagus
description: Plump, diver-caught scallops are pan-seared to a golden brown and served atop a creamy lemon risotto bursting with fresh parmesan cheese. Tender asparagus tips add a delightful pop of green and a touch of earthiness.

name: Herb-Marinated Flank Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
description: A skirt steak's bolder cousin, flank steak is marinated in a vibrant blend of herbs like rosemary, thyme, and oregano, then grilled to juicy perfection.

variant.name: Marinate the flank steak in a Korean-inspired marinade with soy sauce
sesame oil for a different flavor profile

name: Thai Green Curry with Vegetables and Tofu
description: This fragrant curry features a symphony of flavors U+002d the sweetness of coconut milk, the earthiness of green chilies, and the warmth of ginger. A medley of colorful vegetables like broccoli, bell peppers, and eggplant simmer in this flavorful broth alongside pan-fried tofu puffs.

name: Pan-Seared Duck Breast with Cherry Port Wine Sauce
description: Duck breast, known for its rich flavor and crispy skin, is pan-seared to achieve the perfect balance of textures. A luxurious cherry port wine sauce, bursting with sweet and tart flavors, complements the duck perfectly.

variant.name: grill the duck breast instead of pan-searing

name: Seared Ahi Tuna Steaks with Wasabi Mayo and Sesame Seeds
description: Sushi-grade ahi tuna steaks are quickly seared to maintain their rare, tender center. A dollop of creamy wasabi mayo adds a touch of heat, while a sprinkle of sesame seeds provides a nutty crunch.

variant.name: Marinate the tuna in a teriyaki sauce

name: Gourmet Grilled Cheese Dippers with Trio of Spreads
description: Elevate your classic grilled cheese with artisan bread varieties like sourdough or multigrain. Layers of melted Gruyere and Havarti cheeses create a rich and creamy filling. Cut the grilled cheese into bite-sized pieces perfect for dipping.

extra.name: Offer a trio of dipping sauces

variant.name: roasted red peppers for the cheese

name: Miniature Phyllo Cups with Savory Fillings
description: Flaky phyllo dough is transformed into delicate miniature cups, filled with a variety of delectable savory ingredients. Choose from fillings like creamy spinach and ricotta, spicy chorizo and caramelized onions, or a classic Greek combination of crumbled feta cheese and sun-dried tomatoes.

name: Decadent Charcuterie Board with Artisanal Meats
description: A charcuterie board is a feast for the eyes and the palate. Arrange a selection of cured meats like prosciutto and salami alongside an assortment of artisan cheeses like brie, gouda, and cheddar

variant.name: swap out the cured meats for marinated artichoke hearts

name: Spiced Shrimp Cocktail with Cocktail Sauce and Avocado Crema
description: Plump, succulent shrimp are poached in a flavorful court bouillon infused with lemon, herbs, and spices. Once chilled, the shrimp are served with a classic cocktail sauce and a refreshing avocado crema for a delightful dip.

name: Global Skewers with Dipping Sauces
description: Create a fun and interactive appetizer experience with a selection of global-inspired skewers. Choose from options like chicken satay with peanut sauce, grilled lamb skewers with a yogurt mint marinade, or vegetable skewers with a chimichurri dipping sauce.

variant.name: create veggie-only skewers with marinated tofu
